product_name: Anastasia Beverly HillsUniversal Luminous Tinted Lip Gloss
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeDiscover Tinted Lip Gloss by Anastasia Beverly Hills in a stunning range of shades with irresistible luster. These ultra-smooth formulas glaze on the lips for a light-reflecting look in seconds.
details: DetailsBenefitsUniversal shades for all skin tonesProvides long-lasting, glass-like shine in one swipeWeightless, non-sticky formula with comfortable wearabilityInstantly gives the appearance of fuller-looking lipsUltra-smooth formula glides across lips with easeFlat-paddle shaped applicator delivers the perfect amount of product and precise applicationCan be worn over bare lips or layered with liner and lipstick for extra dimensionVanilla-scentedDermatologist tested and non-comedogenicCruelty-FreeFormulated WithoutAlcoholParabensOilSulfatesMineral-OilPhthalatesShadesPeachy Nude ‚Äî dazzling golden peachPeachy ‚Äî dazzling golden amberAmber Sparkle ‚Äî light peachy nudeHoney Diamond ‚Äî dazzling diamond with gold reflectsGoldy ‚Äî metallic warm goldSoft Pink ‚Äî baby pinkSun Baked ‚Äî midtone mauvy pinkDeep Taupe ‚Äî soft beige brownCantaloupe ‚Äî Nude peach with sparkling reflectsButterscotch ‚Äî Neutral peachy beigeCaramel ‚Äî Soft peachy brownLatte ‚Äî Toasted taupeToffee Rose ‚Äî Rosy brown with sparkling reflectsTan Rose ‚Äî Neutral rosy pinkDusty Rose ‚Äî Rosy lilacHoney Kiss ‚Äî Metallic honey goldPink Ginger ‚Äî Metallic rosy bronzeCoral ‚Äî Metallic pinky-peach with gold shimmerItem 2594829How To UseBare LipsApply to the center of the top and bottom lip. Use the tip of the flat-paddle applicator to shape the lip line with precision.Pair with LinerShape and define the lips using Lip Liner.Apply Lip Gloss to the center of the top and bottom lip.Pair with Liner & LipstickShape and define the lips using Lip Liner.Add color with Matte Lipstick.Finish by applying Lip Gloss to the center of the top and bottom lip.IngredientsPolybutene, Isocetyl Stearate, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Ethyl Vanillin, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Dicalcium Phosphate, Mica, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Carmine (CI 75470).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Bare LipsApply to the center of the top and bottom lip. Use the tip of the flat-paddle applicator to shape the lip line with precision.Pair with LinerShape and define the lips using Lip Liner.Apply Lip Gloss to the center of the top and bottom lip.Pair with Liner & LipstickShape and define the lips using Lip Liner.Add color with Matte Lipstick.Finish by applying Lip Gloss to the center of the top and bottom lip.

reviews.headline: What i love in a gloss!
reviews.comments: Im a lipgoss ahollic! When i find a really good one i get it in most the colors! This gloss smells great, thicker so it lasts longer on, the colors are perfect! Cotton Candy is a MUST! Cantalope is a must! The glitter ones are a tad thinner in concistancy. I pray they dont discontinue these ever! I can not stand oily thin glosses that slide right off the lips and does not last more than 20 minutes! Get these! Their sooo good and to me under rated!

reviews.headline: love it.
reviews.comments: the beauty in the sparkle

reviews.headline: Anastasia Beverly hills lipgloss
reviews.comments: omg, not to sticky, it's glossy without a sticky gross feeling.

reviews.headline: Second time buying this and love it
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: Dont buy bad taste
reviews.comments: Was not really fun off it fell grainy and to sticky will wear off so fast and look ugly on bought because it look very shimerry but its just to heavy in my lips to thick

reviews.headline: To drying
reviews.comments: Make my lips dry and it will wear off in minutes was to heavy and grainy i hate it but it looks so good but wont be buting anymore it threw mine away

reviews.headline: Glitter shades are only for young women
reviews.comments: This lipstick goes on smoothly and lasts for a long time. The Amber Sparkly shade is a nice, warm coral, but it is VERY glittery. It would work for young girls, but looks silly on mature women.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend!
reviews.comments: I purchased the Anastasia Beverly Hills lip gloss in the shade tan rose about a month ago and I absolutely love it. This lip gloss is very smooth and not sticky like some glosses.  It's also very pigmented, so the way it appears in the tube is the same as when it's applied. For reference, I'm a very chocolate girl and it's the perfect shade of pink for me. If you're dark skinned and you want to look like a chocolate Barbie Doll, this is your shade. I will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.headline: Holy grail of all lip gloss
reviews.comments: I have tried almost every brand to date and finally found a lip gloss that actually stays on. Tell me how this gloss managed to stay the entire day while maintaining its color and shine. It also left my lips feeling super soft. The color match per undertone is quite accurate and works well with most skin tones. I have to mention that it does have a light fragrance to it, so if you dont like fragrances then you may have to try a different brand. I absolutely love this product and I hope they do not discontinue this in the future as I will contuine buying this for as long as I live

reviews.headline: Lovely formula and color!
reviews.comments: IMO this is a perfect lip gloss and it doesn't creep into lines around my mouth. I love all the Anastasia lip products!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments:
I'm usually a drug store makeup girlie but I decided to splurge on this. I'm SO happy w this as a perfect light / neutral pink shade. Also pretty long lasting for a lip gloss. I think this is my new go-to

Also LOVE the smell

reviews.headline: The perfect color
reviews.comments: I bought this lipgloss for my niece's wedding. I wanted something soft since I was wearing black. The lip gloss feels beautiful on your lips and the color is absolutely gorgeous.

reviews.headline: Clear shimmer shade felt sticky
reviews.comments: I bought the clear shimmer shade but it felt too sticky, would not buy again.

reviews.headline: I love this lip gloss! It is my favorite!
reviews.comments: It's the best lip gloss ever! Makes me lips look and feel amazing!

reviews.headline: Glossy and Bossy
reviews.comments: Great tint! Nice shine!

reviews.headline: If I could every shade I would
reviews.comments: This gloss is amazing and you get long wear out of  it. For now I bought cantaloupe and cotton candy .Absolutely amazing if I could wear every color I would by them .

reviews.headline: Better lip gloss ever made
reviews.comments: Best lip Gloss ever made. No one can tell me different.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: It complement my skin tone very well

media.headline: I would buy this product again
I so love this color so many compliments....

faceoff_positive.comments: I like to apply a nude lip liner first then add this on top. Undressed is my favorite shade. It's more pink than brown. but it is a beautiful nude. I will definitely be purchasing these at my local Ulta. Goes on even. Very pigmented and have a nice sweet smell to them. The only downside is that you have to constantly reapply.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is a great pro

faceoff_negative.comments: I recently bought Tara and I have very mixed feelings about it. When I first put it on the color is perfect but then as time goes on throughout the day I noticed the color kind of bleeds outside my lip line. I haven't seen anyone else say the same thing so I'm not sure if I got a bad one or what. It's really disappointing because I absolutely love the color and haven't seen many lip glosses with the same selection as ABH. I'm not sure if I would recommend this because I'm very torn on this product myself
faceoff_negative.headline: Iffy
